# Draft:Chairperson of the administrative apparatus of the Pony Kingdom Fandom-State

The Prime Minister of the Pony Kingdom, formally titled the Chairperson of the administrative apparatus of the Pony Kingdom Fandom-State, is a ceremonial and administrative role within the fan-created constitutional monarchy known as the Pony Kingdom. This fictional government is part of a broader My Little Pony fandom-state, blending imaginative world-building with structured governance inspired by real-world political systems.
Origins and Fandom Context
The Pony Kingdom was established by members of the My Little Pony fan community as a symbolic micronation, designed to celebrate and extend the lore of Equestria through participatory storytelling. While not affiliated with Hasbro or the official MLP franchise, the Kingdom draws heavily from the aesthetics, themes, and character archetypes of My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic.
The Prime Minister serves as the executive head of the Royal Government, overseeing administrative functions, ceremonial duties, and community coordination. This role complements the Monarch, who embodies the symbolic and cultural heart of the fandom-state.
Role and Responsibilities
* Oversees the day-to-day operations of the Pony Kingdom Royal Government.
* May preside over the Cabinet and Assembly, if they choose to assume those roles.
* Coordinates ceremonial events, fandom initiatives, and archival documentation.
* Supported by two Vice Deputies who ensure continuity in case of absence or transition.
* The Prime Minister often collaborates with fan artists, writers, and ceremonial officials to maintain the Kingdom’s internal lore, update its wiki-based constitution, and organize commemorative observances.
Succession and Tenure
portrait of Liam Keel, taken in September 2025.]]
Prime Ministers are appointed or elected through internal fandom mechanisms, often based on creative contributions, ceremonial merit, or community consensus. Terms vary depending on narrative arcs, ceremonial transitions, or constitutional amendments within the fandom-state.
Relationship to My Little Pony
The Pony Kingdom functions as a meta-extension of Equestria, allowing fans to explore themes of governance, diplomacy, and legacy through original characters and ceremonial roles. The Prime Minister may interact with canonical MLP characters in fan fiction, visual art, or ceremonial decrees, often blending satire, homage, and imaginative reinterpretation.
This role has gained prominence through platforms like TikTok, Discord, and fandom wikis, where figures such as Liam Keel—ceremonial monarch and creative architect of the Kingdom—have used the office to formalize fanon lore and elevate community storytelling into structured civic mythology.
